content:
Hi
Not sure if this the appropriate forum but though it was logical to ask here.
Does anyone have experience in running ONC lantern
I wanted to run it in a docker container but I got a bit lost with the instructions
https://github.com/onc-healthit/lantern-back-end
In case you haven't solved your problem yet -- @Matt Mayer might be able to help.
Hi @Santosh Pai thanks for reaching out, I will defined be able to help you with any issues you're having with running an instance of Lantern. What specifically are you having trouble with?
PS: There is a production instance of Lantern at https://lantern.healthit.gov if you are interested in exploring the data there
Thanks Matt. The website helped. I was looking for payer endpoints but did not find them. ( probably bcos they are not published )
